recipe.title: Chocolate Maple Syrup
ingredients: 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder, or to taste
1/2 stick (1/4 cup) unsalted butter, cut into pieces
instructions: In a small heavy saucepan heat maple syrup over moderate heat until hot. Whisk in cocoa powder, butter, and a pinch of salt and simmer, whisking, 1 minute.
